description.value:
The visages of beasts are carved into the painted wood of a beast staff, with a large head on top. When used as a weapon, the staff is a +2 greater striking staff. While wielding the staff while you have it prepared, you're affected by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.BBvV7qoXGdw09q1C]{Speak with Animals}. If you have Wild Empathy, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus on checks using it.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.MPxbKoR54gkYkqLO]{Gouging Claw}
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.EE7Q5BHIrfWNCPtT]{Runic Body}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gfPjmG6Fe6D3MFjl]{Pest Form}
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wp09USMB3GIW1qbp]{Animal Form}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge}
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wp09USMB3GIW1qbp]{Animal Form}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XI6Lzd2B5pernkPd]{Insect Form}
  • 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wp09USMB3GIW1qbp]{Animal Form}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.VuPDHoVEPLbMfCJC]{Bestial Curse}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XI6Lzd2B5pernkPd]{Insect Form}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gfPjmG6Fe6D3MFjl]{Pest Form}
  • 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wp09USMB3GIW1qbp]{Animal Form}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XI6Lzd2B5pernkPd]{Insect Form}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.YtesyvfAIwXOqISq]{Moon Frenzy}
  • 6th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.dN8QBNuTiaBHCKUe]{Baleful Polymorph}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.YtesyvfAIwXOqISq]{Moon Frenzy}

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
